Segment.name: PCS
Segment.comment: To convey the status of a product service claim or claims or to supply adjustment reason codes and amounts as needed for an entire claim or for a particular item within the claim

Field.name: ClaimStatusCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the status of an entire claim as assigned by the payor, claim review organization or repricing organization

Field.name: AgencyQualifierCode1
Field.comment: Code identifying the agency assigning the code values

Field.name: SourceSubqualifier1
Field.comment: A reference that indicates the table or text maintained by the Source Qualifier

Field.name: ClaimResponseReasonCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the detailed reason for the response

Field.name: AgencyQualifierCode2
Field.comment: Code identifying the agency assigning the code values

Field.name: SourceSubqualifier2
Field.comment: A reference that indicates the table or text maintained by the Source Qualifier

Field.name: DispositionCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the disposition of removed part, subassembly, or assembly

Field.name: Description
Field.comment: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

Field.name: AuthorizationIdentification
Field.comment: Identifier representing authorization of an unusual repair or some attendant condition

SyntaxNote.name: R0104
SyntaxNote.comment: At least one of PCS01 or PCS04 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: C0204
SyntaxNote.comment: If PCS02 is present, then PCS04 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: C0302
SyntaxNote.comment: If PCS03 is present, then PCS02 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: C0709
SyntaxNote.comment: If PCS07 is present, then PCS09 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: C0807
SyntaxNote.comment: If PCS08 is present, then PCS07 is required.
